description:
Garlic Junior and his Spice Boys harness the evil power of the Makyo Star to become stronger than ever, but Gohan, Krillin, and Piccolo are ready to battle this new threat!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Vida de Kami-Sama está em Perigo
Chou Kageki ni Shoubu Da!! Okite Yaburi no Kamisama
ศึกตัดสินแหงหายนะ พระเจ้าตัดสินใจแหกกฏ
超過激に勝負だ!! 掟やぶりの神様
